casebody.data:
William S. PETTY et al. v. H. Kenneth HUNT et al. No. 4407. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 7, 1952. H; Gordon Howard, Denver, Colo., for appellants. P. H. Lamphere, Horace B. Van Valkenburgh III, and Peter J. Little, all of Denver, Colo., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and HUXMAN and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellees.
